name: Rambutan Classification using Gemini API & Machine Learning
description: This project presents an intelligent system to verify and classify Rambutan fruits using AI. It combines Gemini API for fruit-type detection and a custom-trained Machine Learning model to classify rambutans into Raw, Ripe, and Defective categories.
longDescription:
This project presents an intelligent system to verify and classify Rambutan fruits using AI. It combines Gemini API for fruit-type detection and a custom-trained Machine Learning model to classify rambutans into Raw, Ripe, and Defective categories. The system is designed to ensure only fresh (ripe) rambutans are allowed for upload by sellers.

Key Highlights:
‚Ä¢ Gemini API integration to first verify if the uploaded fruit is Rambutan (avoiding wrong entries like lychee or longan)
‚Ä¢ Custom ML model trained to classify images of rambutans into: Raw, Ripe (Only accepted), Defective (Rejected)
‚Ä¢ Uploads are restricted to ripe rambutans only ‚Äì ensuring quality for buyers
‚Ä¢ Seller-side interface with real-time feedback and image preview

Tech Stack:
‚Ä¢ Gemini API ‚Äì for fruit identification
‚Ä¢ TensorFlow/Keras (CNN) ‚Äì for rambutan image classification
‚Ä¢ Python ‚Äì for backend ML processing
‚Ä¢ Firebase / Flask / Django ‚Äì for platform integration
‚Ä¢ Custom Dataset ‚Äì collected and labeled for raw, ripe, and defective rambutans
